name: A Writer's Tour of Copenhagen: Following Hans and Karen
description: Denmark is home to two of the most famous writers of all time - Hans Christian Andersen and Karen Blixen. This specially designed tour in Copenhagen and the north coast above Copenhagen will take you to the places that were significant in Hans Christian Andersen's time. You will also have opportunity to explore the place by the sea that Karen Blixen called home and used as her writing studio for stories such as "Babette's Feast" and "Out of Africa".. You will also get some insight about the current writer's community in Copenhagen and visit the place where that community hangs out for a special annual event.
